resources.string: Upload was a Success!\n Go back >>

"1. Please enable bluetooth for the duration of the game. 
2. Keeping the app open will provide the best experience, but is not necessary. 
3. Campus Sprawl will alert you when you are within 50ft of the item. 
It is up to you to identify the item 
4. Take and upload a photo through the app to gain points 
5. All points are awarded by the admin and may take a little time to appear\ 
6. See the scoreboard to see how you compare to other teams 
7. The Checkpoints menu item will display all checkpoints you must find and their respective statuses 
8. Find a team of at least 2 people and have fun!
"
